name: KOBOLD WARRIOR

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.
